lead_paragraph: An obituary on April 14 about Mark Fidrych, an eccentric pitcher who was known as the Bird and who starred briefly for the Detroit Tigers in the 1970s, misstated the timing of the diagnosis of an injury to his rotator cuff. He had surgery in 1985; the injury did not remain undiagnosed until 1986.
